thread.title: Why Telstra has been put on notice
thread.title_full: Why Telstra has been put on notice

title: Why Telstra has been put on notice
text:
Vodafone and TPG announce $1 billion ‘dark fibre’ deal HARRY TUCKER news.com.au Vodafone and TPG announce $1 billion ‘dark fibre’ deal HARRY TUCKER news.com.au Vodafone Australia’s chief executive Inaki Berroeta is excited to be a challenger. 
THE future is looking good for Aussie mobile phone users, with a new $1 billion deal between internet provider TPG and telco Vodafone set to give greater competition. 
The agreement sees TPG supplying the data network to Vodafone's towers through a technology known as ‘dark fibre’ though a $1 billion deal over the next 15 years. 
“Employing dark fibre is all about preparing Vodafone for the future,” Vodafone Australia chief executive Inaki Berroeta told news.com.au. Other Stories
